Как это часто бывает с по-настоящему рожденными музыкантами, призвание Ли Мейса было обнаружено еще подростком. Мистер Мейс с юных лет гастролировал по родным штатам - талант рос! Lee Mace, неустанно культивируемый в композиционном искусстве, создает хит за хитом в жанрах для взрослых, R & B Pop и элегантный джаз. Его знаменитый альбом «Shine Your Love» был выпущен еще в 1976 году, а в апреле 2010 года Ли перепечатал его, а затем снова стал невероятно популярным. Many new mommies see raising children and growing a family as a full-time job. But more and more mommies are inspired to take on the full-time job of raising children while running a business - all at the same time. And from these ambitious and inspiring mommies, we have the rise of the term "homepreneur" in the small business space. We are a group of dedicated homepreneurs from all walks of life who operate our business from home leveraging on current trends. Our aim to help all women to kick start their own online business and generate a consistent source of income while at the same time raising their family to spend more time with their children and achieving their desired LIFESTYLES and GOALS! If you're an aspiring homepreneur, hoping to make the most out of your past experience, skill, and your current schedule, attend this FREE 1-hour webinar to discover: 1. The cheapest way to start your business online without any experience or professional IT skills 2. What business you should start online 3. How to start your own online business without having to buy stocks or ship products 4. How to build a 5-figure revenue online business from the comfort of your home with your children at your side with just 1 - 2 hours a day 5. What is the current online trend that Homepreneur should ride on 6. How to start your own online business without having to stock up inventory and pay for overheads. 7. How to advertise and attract customers without spending money on marketing and advertising 8. What are the FREE training and mentorship provided for you to kick start your Homepreneur journey (even when you have ZERO marketing skills and IT skills) About the Trainer: An award-winning ex-teacher from Singapore, Ms Jeeann Kuan left her teaching career to be a stay-at-home mom to take care of her 3 kids. She started her own online business from home and she generated 18.5 million revenue in 18 months and a 6-figure passive income monthly. Today she goes around the world sharing and empowering aspiring homepreneurs to start their own online business. Who should attend: 1. Stay-at-home Moms or Working Moms 2. Retirees 3. Existing Home-based Marketers 4. Single Moms 5. Online E-Commerce business owner(s) 6. Any women who want an extra source of income Come on and join us in this amazing FREE online workshop to experience the revolutionary E-Commerce Business platform at NO COST! RSVP early to secure your seat to avoid disappointment for those who truly want to create a better life for you and your loved ones. Note: This is an ONLINE event. The instruction & the link to join the webinar will be sent to you upon confirmation (check the ticket). Thank you and we hope you receive tonnes of value! (If you cannot make it at the above time you can watch the replay webinar at a time convenient for you.) City Pub Crawl - Moscow  - it is a bar party-tour for visitors and residents of Moscow.  Guided by expert of pub crawling, participants move from one bar to another, get to know each other, play funny games and contests, get bonuses and cocktails in bars. Every time we plan our route in order to visit the most exciting events: parties, concerts or dancing on the bar!

Things included in the price:
- Show programm
- 4 Welcome drinks
- 4 Bars   
- English-speaking guide 
- Games, contests, prizes
- Photo


More info:
https://www.facebook.com/Citypubcrawl

21:00:00","tz_id":null,"description":" - Women, are you searching for an additional way to earn extra income? - Have you always wanted to start an online business but do not know where to start?  - Have you always wanted to create passive income to provide a better life for your loved ones? Many new mommies see raising children and growing a family as a full-time job. But more and more mommies are inspired to take on the full-time job of raising children while running a business - all at the same time. And from these ambitious and inspiring mommies, we have the rise of the term "homepreneur" in the small business space. We are a group of dedicated homepreneurs from all walks of life who operate our business from home leveraging on current trends. Our aim to help all women to kick start their own online business and generate a consistent source of income while at the same time raising their family to spend more time with their children and achieving their desired LIFESTYLES and GOALS! If you're an aspiring homepreneur, hoping to make the most out of your past experience, skill, and your current schedule, attend this FREE 1-hour webinar to discover: 1.
